TopicTitle: My Fan Montage, With Music! (Mods Installed)

Articles.Content:
Hey there everyone, thank you for checking out my latest upload. I get that the internet is full of this and it gets tiring seeing them flash before your very screen. So again, thank you for simply giving this a look!


On a side note, I consider myself still rather noobish when it comes to KSP. I don't think I've broken 300 hours yet, and only recently installed mods for funsies. Been to a few planets and their orbiting moons, but am still far from exploring all that there is. I'm going to be starting it all over again in career mode, so I am looking forward to uploading that! I'm sure I'll be repeating the phrase, "I've made a terrible mistake."


Laaaaaaaaaters!
Really glad that you enjoyed watching it!
